experience.title: Regional Commercial Manager
experience.description: Growing FENIX ExpressRecruited, trained, and led a high-performing team of  Sales & Account Managers, resulting in XXXX+ business onboardings and exceeding XXXX million ARR within 12 months.Negotiated and secured strategic partnerships with global brands (L'Oreal, Chanel, Al Shaya) and major regional entities (Nakheel, Yas Island, Damac),Secured high-value longterm government contracts through competitive tenders. Cultivated strategic relationships with key transportation authorities including RTA Dubai, ITC Abu Dhabi, MOT Qatar, and MOTC Bahrain, facilitating smooth operations across multiple jurisdictions.Spearheaded  critical tech and product transformation initiatives, including the implementation of a new CRM system and launch of new verticals such as Fenix Fuel and F10.

Cultivated strategic relationships with key transportation authorities including RTA Dubai, ITC Abu Dhabi, MOT Qatar, and MOTC Bahrain, facilitating smooth operations across multiple jurisdictions.Spearheaded critical tech and product transformation initiatives, including the implementation of a new CRM system and launch of new verticals such as Fenix Fuel and F10.

experience.title: Regional Launch Manager
experience.description: Bringing Micromobility to the UKPioneered Neuron's UK market entry as the second European hire, formulating go-to-market strategy and building the operations team. Successfully launched operations in 2 major UK cities, while establishing key stakeholder relationships and elevating the brand's regional presence.Resourced and Lead growth of the UK business from a small pre-launch team, to 50 members of staffDeveloped partnerships with local government and private sector groups
